plot: International Award Winning Actor Jorge Sanz, star of the Academy Award© winning picture, &"BELLE EPOQUE&", stars in this action packed film in which a corporal of the guard is teamed with a young prisoner to solve the strange killings that have occurred in the walled city of Zafarinas. The young team finds themselves plunged into a world of drugs, deceit and passion where they find that all is not what it seems.   Written by
title: Moriras en Chafarinas

lists.title: Caray todas son peliculas españolas y faltan
